title: Mark address as shown when it is about to be fully displayed

labels.name: E: Desktop Wallet New Activity Improvement

body:
For this issue, we need to check all below-mentioned places in the app, check if the address is fully displayed, like it's now in the profile showcase (the image below), and hide it somehow (at least elide). 

Then when the user is about to reveal the full address we need to update a flag for that address calling statusgo endpoint `accounts_addressWasShown`.

![1](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/86303051/9780cc14-036a-4b53-a49e-4eedf0b30387)
